colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(ZHES KLU GTOR BDUD RTZI'I CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD PA PHUL DU BYUNG BA MER GEN CHOS RJE DGE 'DUN BZANG POS CUNG ZAD RGYAS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I KLU GTOR BDUD RTZI'I KEL SHAL GZHIR BZHAG CING, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I KLU GTOR BDUD RTZI'I MI'I CHU RGYUN GYIS ZUR BRGYAN NAS RANG GI GANG DPOGS KYI LEGS CHAG KYANG RGYAN TE, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA nI PRA DZNY'AS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA GU SHR'I CHOS RJE KUN DGA' RIN CHEN NO, ,@013B 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, 'GRO BA KUN GYI NAD GDON SDIG SGRIB THAMS CAD BYANG ZHING DAG NAS SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: SU MA TI MA nI PRA DZNY'A,
